activities:
Security Software Solutions provides identity verification services for financial institutions, insurance companies, web providers, employers and others. We strictly adhere to the U.S. Fair Credit Reporting Act and provisions of the GLB.  We have many international customers who use our service as part of their requirements under the U.S. Patriot Act for money wire transfers, international payments etc..  Information from the EU will be used in the following manner:
Individuals who wish to avail themselves of web based services, on line casinos for example, have to verify that they are adults as well as provide a valid address.  The potential customer will key in their name and address, which will be matched against the data to see if there is a match. If a match is found the transaction will continue forward to the next step.  If there is not a match found that fact is also reported for other action for corrected input.
This is the only way the EU data will be used.
privacyprograms: Better Business Bureau online reliability program. http://www.bbbonline.org/r2.cfm?id=1286000165
